department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Implementation of request for Standing offer for the supply delivery and offloading of miscellaneous Grocery products
description: The Department of National Defense require a Standing Offer for the supply, delivery and offloading of Miscellaneous Groceries on an as and when requested basis for the period of the Standing Offers contract term. For more information please contact Jill Aquino (SPAC/PSPC) via Email: jill.aquino@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
